name: Bradford Young
title: Director of Photography
bio: Contemporary master of intimate, poetic cinematography. Known for experimental approaches to lighting and color. Pioneer of digital cinematography for intimate narratives. Works with visionary indie and international directors.

signature_look.description: Intimate, poetic cinematography with experimental color approaches. Cool desaturated tones with occasional warm bursts. Grain-heavy aesthetics. Dreamlike quality. Psychological depth through visual language.
signature_look.key_characteristic: Colors and lights express psychological state rather than reality. Cinematography is subjective and emotional.
signature_look.legendary_technique: Pioneer of experimental color temperature shifts; master of anxiety-inducing visual language

primary_cameras.name: Alexa Mini
primary_cameras.use_case: Close character work, psychological intimate scenes

film_stock_emulation.name: Kodak Vision3 200T - Experimental Grade
film_stock_emulation.characteristics: Experimental color shifts, fine grain, psychological mood

technical_specialties.lighting_approach: Psychological lighting that expresses emotional state. Color temperature shifts convey mood. Minimal but meaningful practicals. Lighting that disturbs as much as illuminates.
technical_specialties.color_science: Desaturated with psychological color shifts. Cool dominance with warm accents conveying warmth/danger. Color expresses subconscious.
technical_specialties.exposure_philosophy: Expose for emotional truth, not technical perfection. Grain and artifacts as emotional language.
technical_specialties.dynamic_range_preference: Crushed shadows and lifted blacks for psychological effect

director_collaboration.communication_style: Experimental, philosophical collaboration. Discusses emotion and psychology before technical specs.
director_collaboration.strengths_with_narrative: Externalizes internal emotional states through cinematography. Makes audiences feel psychological unease or comfort through light and color.

emphasis_on: Emotional and psychological expression through cinematography
